Html: Description of this interface says: A very simple IOC container with basic functionality needed to register and resolve instances. But there is no method definition for resolving instances! Such basic functionality should be included in this interface. I was mentioning this problem in previous version too.

The idea was that you would use ISimpleIoc to register classes and IServiceLocator to resolve them. But I agree with you that people seem to be moving away from IServiceLocator. I will update the interface to add the GetXXX methods.

Laurent
